text: i did it, but the returning json showed me, that the two settings are false. So I am not sure if i had to declare them as special options.
Hi Team, I'm looking for an API which gives all the API's list of the HubSpot. Is their any api? please let me know
Thanks <@UU1AVTFKL> -- nice to see you in here!
Docs / Postman configs only. No meta-API.
Thanks  <@U012W4YEUTX> . One more quetion how do we get the owners object meta data properties? I tried the properties api but it does not working.
The Owners API gives me a lot of drama... there is an open bug on the Forum from 2017, where, for example, you cannot retrieve the Phone number and other very helpful fields from an Owner.

I think it is not fully retrofitted into the V3 view of the world and not all of the properties the UI can cheat and get for itself are available in the published API sadly, and I had to double-store things like phone numbers locally to be able to use them in my integration code. :disappointed:
Somebody else on here confirmed they had the same kind of issues I was having a few weeks ago, also.
<@U012W4YEUTX>  So we can get the meta data for owner object in v1 correctly?
Can you share your integration code github link?

Hi all, is anyone else seeing problems with OAuth URLs at this time? I’m getting a 403 error from Cloudfront and the following message... “This request could not be satisfied. This distribution is not configured to allow the HTTP request method that was used for this request. The distribution supports only cachable requests. We can't connect to the server for this app or website at this time. There might be too much traffic or a configuration error. Try again later, or contact the app or website owner.
